ul.li: Due to system limitations, capturing system audio is only supported on Android API level 29 and above, i.e., Android 10 and above.
To improve the success rate of capturing system audio during screen sharing, make sure you call the method and set the audio scenario to AudioScenarioGameStreaming.

pd.ph: Whether to capture system audio during screen sharing:

plentry.pd: Audio configuration for the shared screen stream. See . This parameter takes effect only when captureAudio is set to .

pd.note: Due to system limitations, screen capture is only supported on Android API level 21 and above, i.e., Android 5 and above.
pd.ph: Whether to capture the screen during screen sharing:

plentry.pd: Video encoding configuration for the shared screen stream. See . This parameter takes effect only when captureVideo is set to .
